name: Gone (eeaann9044)
description:
Made created for the Ludum Dare 50 Jam under the theme "Delay the inevitable".

IMPORTANT!!!  Be sure to look everywhere before/while progressing to understand the story

Note:

- Click the start button (bottom left) to start the game

- Click on the screen to lock the mouse

CONTROLS Click - Starts interaction with objects Q - exits interaction
